title: Blocktest won't run
body:
When i start the with:

```
geth --rpccorsdomain "http://localhost:3000" blocktest ~/Developer/tests/BlockTests/bcRPC_API_Test.json RPC_API_Test rpc
```

It crashes the node with the following error:

```
I0527 17:44:53.507971     664 backend.go:256] Protocol Version: 60, Network Id: 0
I0527 17:44:53.508087     664 backend.go:266] Blockchain DB Version: 3
I0527 17:44:53.511169     664 chain_manager.go:257] Last block (#0) fd4af92a79c7fc2fd8bf0d342f2e832e1d4f485c85b9152d2039e03bc604fdca TD=131072
I0527 17:44:53.518719     664 server.go:293] Starting Server
I0527 17:44:53.564461     664 udp.go:189] Listening, enode://4fd744b070ce4267fa5d86dd4a86df2958bd22ccd891a69bbc64a40c48f8d83b38f7be711c64c5f6c5e5f477e37d8e598f3c4d6aae58a235d57625e058e82afd@[::]:30303
I0527 17:44:53.565054     664 backend.go:477] Server started
I0527 17:44:53.565064     664 server.go:530] Listening on [::]:30303
I0527 17:44:57.103363     664 chain_manager.go:655] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) in 1.044412297s. #1 [d6b7b691 / d6b7b691]

...

Block Test post state validated, starting RPC interface.
I0527 17:44:57.266551     664 cmd.go:137] Starting Geth/v0.9.25/darwin/go1.4.1
Fatal: Error starting Ethereum: server already running
Fatal: Error starting Ethereum: server already running
```

I restarted my computer and have nothing else running. Starting `geth` without the blocktest runs fine, though!

Can anybody reproduce that?
